scripts.format: prettier --cache --write css/style.css css/tailwind.source.css css/tokens.css "docs/**/*.html" tailwind.config.cjs README.md
scripts.lint: npm run lint:css && npm run lint:hex
scripts.check:css: npm run build:css && git diff --exit-code -- css/tailwind.generated.css
scripts.test:visual: npm run build:css && npx playwright test
scripts.test:visual:update: npm run build:css && cross-env UPDATE_VISUAL_BASELINES=1 npx playwright test
